responces: Hey, I am Jarvis. Please enter the query for which you seek support.

patterns: Who is the Chairman of AICTE?
Who is the Head Of AICTE?

responces: The All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) is a statutory body, and a national-level council for technical education, under the Department of Higher Education and Ministry of Education.
76 Years ago, established in November 1945 first as an advisory body and later on in 1987 given statutory status by an Act of Parliament.
AICTE is responsible for proper planning and coordinated development of the technical education and management education system in India.
The AICTE is composed of the e-Governance, Approval, Planning and Coordination, Academic, University, Administration, Finance, and Research, Institutional and Faculty Development Bureaus.
AICTE allows another 20 institutes to offer BTech in regional language from this year
After hitting 10-yr low, engineering seats go up as AICTE approves 142 new technical institutes
AICTE introduced Technical Book Writing and Translation in 12 Indian languages
AICTE Revises Academic Calendar, Classes for First-year Students to Begin on October 10
